mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_purchase_detail t LEFT JOIN t_customer_info b ON t.companyid = b.id LEFT JOIN t_production_stock c ON t.productid = c.id LEFT JOIN t_material_stock d ON t.stockid = d.id
t.status = 1
AND ${key} like CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')
ORDER BY t.deline, t.orderdate limit #{pageOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(1) FROM t_purchase_detail t LEFT JOIN t_customer_info b ON t.companyid = b.id LEFT JOIN t_production_stock c ON t.productid = c.id LEFT JOIN t_material_stock d ON t.stockid = d.id
t.status = 1
AND ${key} like CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')
ORDER BY t.deline, t.orderdate

SELECT
FROM t_purchase_detail t LEFT JOIN t_customer_info b ON t.companyid = b.id LEFT JOIN t_production_stock c ON t.productid = c.id LEFT JOIN t_material_stock d ON t.stockid = d.id
t.status = 1
and t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
